<p>微信小店现已全面打通小程序生态，为开发者提供强大的电商能力支持。本文将详细介绍各项集成功能及代码实现方案。</p>

<h2 id="一商品展示与交易能力">一、商品展示与交易能力</h2>
<h3 id="1-商品卡片嵌入">1. 商品卡片嵌入</h3>
<pre><code class="language-javascript">// 基础商品卡片嵌入
&lt;store-product product-id="123456" app-id="wx1234567890abcdef"&gt;&lt;/store-product&gt;

// 自定义样式
&lt;store-product
  product-id="123456"
  custom-style="{
    card: { 'background-color': '#FAFAFA', 'border-radius': '8px' },
    title: { 'color': '#333', 'font-weight': 'bold' },
    price: { 'color': '#FF6146', 'font-size': '18px' }
  }"
&gt;&lt;/store-product&gt;


// uniapp-vue2  tips：使用了小店商品循环
&lt;!-- #ifdef MP-WEIXIN --&gt;
  &lt;store-product :appid="shop.shop_appid" :product-id="item.product_id" custom-content="true"&gt;
    &lt;view class="goods-img"&gt;
      &lt;image :src="item.pic" mode="aspectFill" /&gt;
    &lt;/view&gt;
    &lt;view class="goods-info"&gt;
      &lt;view class="goods-name"&gt;{{ item.name }}&lt;/view&gt;
      &lt;view class="goods-price"&gt;&lt;text class="goods-unit"&gt;¥&lt;/text&gt;{{ item.market_price }}
      &lt;/view&gt;
      &lt;text
        class="goods-pprice"&gt;预估优惠￥{{ (item.market_price - item.sell_price).toFixed(2) }}&lt;/text&gt;
    &lt;/view&gt;
  &lt;/store-product&gt;
&lt;!-- #endif --&gt;
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>示例：<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2243302/202507/2243302-20250702105553047-1666538759.jpg" alt="img" loading="lazy"></p>
</blockquote>

<h3 id="3-优选联盟带货">3. 优选联盟带货</h3>
<pre><code class="language-javascript">// 获取带货商品详情
wx.request({
  url: "https://api.weixin.qq.com/channels/ec/product/get",
  data: {
    product_id: "123456",
    access_token: "YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN",
  },
  success: (res) =&gt; {
    const promotionLink = res.data.product_promotion_link;
    // 使用推广链接嵌入商品
    wx.navigateTo({
      url: `/pages/product/detail?promotion_link=${encodeURIComponent(
        promotionLink
      )}`,
    });
  },
});
</code></pre>

<h3 id="2-订单管理">2. 订单管理</h3>

  orderId: "ORDER123456789",
  success: (res) =&gt; {
    console.log("打开订单详情成功");
  },
  fail: (err) =&gt; {
    console.error("打开订单详情失败", err);
  },

<h2 id="三直播与视频集成">三、直播与视频集成</h2>
<h3 id="1-视频号直播">1. 视频号直播</h3>
<pre><code class="language-javascript">// 获取直播信息
wx.getChannelsLiveInfo({
  finderUsername: "finder_name",
  success: (res) =&gt; {
    if (res.liveStatus === 1) {
      // 直播中
      wx.openChannelsLive({
        finderUsername: "finder_name",
        feedId: res.feedId,
        nonceId: res.nonceId,
      });
    }
  },
});

// 预约直播
wx.reserveChannelsLive({
  finderUsername: "finder_name",
  success: (res) =&gt; {
    console.log("预约状态:", res.state);
  },
});
</code></pre>
<h3 id="2-视频号视频嵌入">2. 视频号视频嵌入</h3>
<pre><code class="language-javascript">// 嵌入视频号视频
&lt;channel-video
  finder-username="finder_name"
  feed-id="FEED123456"
  video-id="VIDEO123456"
&gt;&lt;/channel-video&gt;;

// 跳转视频活动
wx.openChannelsActivity({
  finderUsername: "finder_name",
  feedId: "FEED123456",
  videoId: "VIDEO123456",
});

// uniapp-vue2 还可以简单实现跳转视频之后计时进行奖励发放（省略其他逻辑）
uni.showModal({
  title: "温馨提示",
  content: "观看满15秒可获奖励",
  confirmText: "继续观看",
  success(res) {
    if (res.confirm) {
      uni.openChannelsActivity({
        finderUserName: item.sph_id,
        feedId: item.sph_video_id,
        success: (res) =&gt; {
          const timestamp = Date.now();
          app.post(
            "对应接口",
            {
              sid: item.sph_id,
              vid: item.sph_video_id,
              event: 0,
              time1: timestamp,
            },
            function (result) {
              const jumpInfo = {
                sid: item.sph_id,
                vid: item.sph_video_id,
                event: 0,
                timestamp,
              };
              uni.setStorageSync("videoJumpInfo", jumpInfo);
            }
          );
        },
      });
    }
  },
});
</code></pre>
